generic.title: error
generic.message: Exchange error occured, please try again later

fillOrKill.title: error
fillOrKill.message: We cannot make an exchange on the specified terms. Please try later again.

balance.title: error
balance.message: Balance error occured, please try again later

gateway.title: Gateway is unavailable
gateway.message: Gateway became temporarily unavailable, please try again later.

sign-up-2.message: You have reached maximum request limit. Please try again later.

unknown_error.message: An unexpected error occured. Please, try later again.

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.description: Fast and reliable exchange of assets

vesting.title: Vesting balance
vesting.description: All vesting balances for your account

wallet.tokenizedAssetsEmpty: Click "Tokenize" to get your first asset tokenized

enterPassword.title: Enter password
enterPassword.text: For further action, please enter your password. This is for confirm

tooltip.info: Use this field to add any additional information to the operation. Operation fee depends on the message length.
tooltip.warning: Please notice that message won't be added to the operation if the recipient does not have a valid memo key.

send.label: Send assets
send.maxAmount: Max amount to send: <%= amount %> <%= asset %>

empty.title: No assets to be sent
empty.description: To send an asset, you need to have at least one asset available in your wallet. Go to the 'Wallet' section and deposit or tokenize any asset.

receive.label: Receive
receive.title: Login for receiving currency
receive.description: In order to receive <%= asset %>, please enter your login as specified above into the recipient's line. The QR code on the right also contains the login to your account.

exchange.label: Exchange

empty.title: No assets to be exchanged
empty.description: To make an exchange, you need to have at least one asset available in your wallet. Go to the 'Wallet' section and deposit or tokenize any asset.

exchange.warning: You will receive at least this amount.

exchangePro.noOpenPositions: You have no open positions yet
exchangePro.noMatch: No markets found matching your search criteria

tokenize.label: Tokenize
tokenize.addressLabel: Please send your <%= assetName %> to the address below
tokenize.testnetWarning: Please, don’t send your real tokens to this address. Testnet only.
tokenize.warning: Please check the external transaction carefully. OTN is not responsible for transactions in the external networks.
tokenize.minAmountWarning: Minimum value to tokenize is <%= minValue %> <%= assetName %>.

detokenize.label: Detokenize
detokenize.feeLabel: You will pay an additional gateway fee
detokenize.maxAmount: Max amount to detokenize: <%= amount %> <%= asset %>

empty.title: No assets to be detokenized
empty.description: To make an detokenization, you need to have at least one asset available in your wallet. Go to the 'Wallet' section and deposit or tokenize any asset.

amount.minValue: The minimal amount to detokenize is "<%= minValue %>", because it should include gateway fee

detokenize.testnetWarning: Please, withdraw your tokens to testnet addresses only.
detokenize.disabledTitle: Detokenization for this asset is not supported or temporarily disabled.
detokenize.disabledDescription: Please check back later or convert your funds to a supported asset

signUp.passwordLabel: The password will be generated automatically
signUp.rulesTitle: Account name must match the following rules:

result.passwordWarning: Attention! Keep your password in a safe place. If you lose your password, you will not be able to restore access to your account.

empty.title: No transaction history
empty.description: To see your operations here, you need to have made at least one transaction. Go to the 'Wallet' section and detokenize or tokenize any asset.

error.title: History page won't load
error.description: External history page is not available

confirmed.label: Confirmed
confirmed.description: Confirmed means that this block was confirmed by the required majority of witnesses and operations it contains cannot be reverted.

pending.label: Success
pending.description: Success means that this block was not yet confirmed by the required majority of witnesses and operations it contains can still be reverted. However the probability of the block getting reverted is extremely low.

500.title: This page won't load
500.description: Sorry about that. Please try refreshing

Gateway.description: The operation is suspended due to temporary unavailability of the gateway. We’re currently trying to fix this.

Node.title: There is a connectivity issue
Node.description: We'll be back as soon as possible.

tooltip.notSupported: Detokenization for this asset is not supported or temporarily disabled. Please check back later or convert your funds to a supported asset

validation.number: Should be a valid positive number

assetAmount.insufficient: You have insufficient funds. Add <%= delta %> or enter another amount
assetAmount.orderBookLimit: The max amount is "<%= limit %>". Please reduce the amount by "<%= delta %>".

accountName.required: Account name should not be empty
accountName.length: Account name must contain from <%= minimum %> to <%= maximum %> symbols

invalid.number: Account name must start with a lowercase letter (a-z)
invalid.regexp: Account name must consist of lowercase letters (a-z). Presence of digit, hyphen (-) or full stop (.) is mandatory requirement.
invalid.hyphen: Account name should not end with a hyphen (-)
invalid.dot: Account name should not end with a full stop (.)

username.ownAccount: You can't send funds to yourself

placeOrder.emptyPrice: Price field should not be empty
placeOrder.priceLessThanZero: Price should be a valid positive number
placeOrder.emptyAmount: Amount field should not be empty
placeOrder.insufficient: You have insufficient funds. Add <%= delta %> <%= asset %> or enter another amount
